posts.description: Hasan Piker Is Twitch's Top Streamer - The New York Times
posts.extended: Anne Alexander, a 33-year-old New Yorker, watched Mr. Piker’s channel for hours the day after the election. “Hasan consumes the internet at the speed of the internet,” she said. “He has 50,000 tabs open and he’s going from Fox to CNN to Twitter to whatever. He’s consuming news from across the aisle. He’s on social media, on reputable news sources, he’s also reading all the comments that come in, then sometimes he’s listening to commentators and responding to them. It’s extremely dynamic.”
